## Engine.detachScript() method

Detaches a script from a host, by module ID or instance, if enabled.

No-op when disabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
detachScript<T extends Host>(host: T, idOrInstance: string | RuntimeScript<T>): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

T


</td><td>

Host to detach from.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

string \| [RuntimeScript](doc/markdown/./scene.runtimescript.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

Target script by module ID or instance reference.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
